Description: Stone tool in an ovoid shape used on several faces for polishing or grinding. Two areas at the upper surface are very well smoothed and darkened, with a neighbouring area indented for a better grip. A larger area at the base is well smoothed and darkened as well and flattened down. Larger salt crystals on upper and lower surface.
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 182)
